comments.body: Can you change this name to "dags_in_image"?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +131,135 @@        # NOTE: user can build the dags into the docker image directly,
        # this will set to True if so
        self.dags_in_docker = conf.get(self.kubernetes_section, 'dags_in_docker')

        # NOTE: `git_repo` and `git_branch` must be specified together as a pair

comments.body: this would collide with the changes in https://github.com/apache/incubator-airflow/pull/3770/files#diff-b1d8d65aeaa7d031dfe5b197d6c5aa69L200

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +201,205 @@    def _validate(self):
        if not self.dags_volume_claim and not self.dags_in_docker \
                and (not self.git_repo or not self.git_branch):
            raise AirflowConfigException(
                'In kubernetes mode the following must be set in the `kubernetes` '
